name: Ore Archer
description:
You are a miner and the cool sort of one who uses a bow and explosive arrows. Delve deep beneath the surface of the earth and overcome creeping lava, swarms of flying bats and rockfalls as you search for the precious Magma Gem, the rarest gemstone in the world. Five levels of mayhem!

Instructions: WSAD moves your miner, aim using the mouse. Left mouse fires your bow. Have fun.

This game was made by kratorspore for Ludum Dare 29 with the theme "beneath the surface".
